title: [feature request] SIGNUM an optimizer that takes the sign of gradient or momentum.
body_html:
The SIGNUM is an optimizer that takes the sign of gradient or momentum.
Please see the detailed description of SIGNUM in the original paper at: https://arxiv.org/abs/1802.04434

I would like to start the process of a feature request if accepted by the community.And I am willing to create a pull request and implement the code after discussion.
